result.eng: When the operation was over, the doctor came out of the operating theatre.
result.ga: Nuair a bhí an obráid thart tháinig an dochtúir amach as an obrádlann
result.orig: Nuair a bhí an obráid thart tháinig an dochtúir amach as an obrádlann
result.html: Nuair a bhí an obráid thart tháinig an dochtúir amach as an obrádlannWhen the operation was over, the doctor came out of the operating theatre.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃí an obráid ṫart ṫáinig an doċtúir amaċ as an obrádlannWhen the operation was over, the doctor came out of the operating theatre.
